emails.subject: Welcome Micro Focus – Enterprise Sales Organization
emails.body:
*** Internal Use – OpenText Confidential ***

 

Welcome to all our new colleagues from Micro Focus!  

 

Today, we start our next adventure as the Enterprise Sales team, taking on new markets and new opportunities. In Enterprise Sales, we cover G10k accounts in North America and Western Europe.  We are responsible for go-to-market for all businesses, except Cybersecurity and Portfolio.    

 

Micro Focus brings critical technologies to OpenText. We are proven market leaders in Content Services, Business Network, Digital Experience, LegalTech and Cybersecurity.  Micro Focus brings new categories of AI & Analytics, Application Delivery, Application Modernization, and Digital Operations Management (ITOM). With our combined capabilities, we will be helping even more customers win.

 

The growth opportunities ahead of us are tremendous, and we are excited to be expanding our team.  

 

First, let me introduce the new members of my direct staff: 

*	Gonzalo Usandizaga, leading ITOM Sales 
*	Tom Ament, leading ADM Sales 
*	Stuart McGill, leading AMC Cloud Sales 
*	Pedro Soldado, leading AMC License Sales 
*	Mark Fazio, leading Micro Focus Strategic Accounts

 

Serge Savchenko will be taking on the expanded role of leading our Analytics & AI Sales team, inclusive of Legal Tech.  Reporting into Serge, additional to the LegalTech team will be: 

*	Toni Grilli, leading OpenText AI and Analytics Sales
*	Flemming Andersen, leading Vertica Sales 
*	Bill Saumarez, leading IDOL Sales

 

In addition, the OpenText Enterprise Security teams will be moving to join the Cybersecurity team under Prentiss Donohue: 

*	Anthony DiBello will report into Matt Marriott 
*	Valerie Wrenholt will be the interim leader for BrightCloud Threat Intelligence reporting into Matt Marriott  

 

Lastly, reporting into me:

*	Michael Neiswender will continue to be the OEM/API Sales leader
*	David Hurley will lead GTM Transformation Programs 

 

To learn more about our go-forward priorities, please join the Enterprise Sales Town Hall today @ 10amEST. See here <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Felt-town-hall-schedule%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C5aacd5774b7f4443fffa08db0385e5f4%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107646233501795%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=GqZEw58N8WyC8at0RpnQm3qRwCzkG87xcNJlUoJQagE%3D&reserved=0> .  

 

Visit here <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fannouncements%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C5aacd5774b7f4443fffa08db0385e5f4%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107646233501795%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=qz79I0v7YeOVl%2F%2FZdKXlB1194RrQxSydNdyX7syU08c%3D&reserved=0>  for all the ELT announcements and our organizational charts. 

 

If you are looking for materials to help support you in speaking with customers, please visit the OTC Micro Focus Page <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fwelcome-micro-focus%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C5aacd5774b7f4443fffa08db0385e5f4%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107646233501795%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=qBfcDdjU9EiwZbf5QR76Spyvq8dqSUb6nNjZXUVa9UU%3D&reserved=0>  for customer-facing employee resources and FAQs <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fmicro-focus-frequently-asked-questions%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C5aacd5774b7f4443fffa08db0385e5f4%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107646233501795%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=fUI%2FmB%2Bx6k8IF6SLt54L6hMPL4c44bk7TJ6c6FSasIo%3D&reserved=0> .  And, for your convenient reference, I’ve attached the new manager’s guide <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fintranet.opentext.com%2Fintranet%2Fllisapi.dll%2Ffetchcsui%2F2001%2F37493267%2F55047057%2F55046612%2F55048800%2F99554679%2F145270795%2FManager_Guide_Welcome_to_OpenText.pdf%3Fnodeid%3D223224417%26vernum%3D-2&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C5aacd5774b7f4443fffa08db0385e5f4%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107646233501795%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8ck4aPSNL1AJJyBZbgd6nBhF0IerqIguNRVppeS8ZDU%3D&reserved=0>  for Micro Focus people managers.

 

Cheers to Day 1! 

 

#OpenTextUnited

 

Ted

emails.subject: Welcome! Instructions to complete your OpenText IT Onboarding
emails.body:
Internal Use – Confidential – To: Micro Focus employees

 

Welcome! 

 

We are excited to welcome you to the OpenText family! In this email, you’ll find the instructions and resources you need to get set up, connected, and onboarded with OpenText IT.

 

Action required: 

Please read this email in its entirety and complete the five steps in the order outlined below. This will help ensure a smooth transition over the coming days and weeks. 

 

Important:

You will have received an email from notification@core.opentext.com <mailto:notification@core.opentext.com>  prompting you to activate OpenText Core Share, an application for file sharing and collaboration. Please do not activate your Core Share account until you have completed the steps below.

 

Need help?

If you experience any issues while following the steps below, please contact IT through the support channels listed at the bottom of this email.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Step 1: Note your OpenText credentials and email address

 

 

 

A note about your new email address: 

Your current Micro Focus email address remains your primary email address until further notice. All emails sent to your new OpenText email address will be forwarded to your Micro Focus mailbox. Please continue to use your Micro Focus mailbox until instructed otherwise. 

 

That said, let’s get started on setting up your OpenText domain credentials and email address: 

 

*	Username: wmarcq
*	Password: caustic^sinceIncite7
*	Email address: wmarcq@opentext.com

 

You’ll need these credentials for your set up, so keep this information handy. However, be sure to keep it private. Do not print this page.

 

 

 

 

Step 2: Change your OpenText password

 

 

 

1.	In a web browser on your computer, go to: https://www.opentext.com/updatepassword <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.opentext.com%2Fupdatepassword&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848059024%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=vobP6BovWEKNg9jl5WGA7HGUYI1Ev475v5nlnn0pvOI%3D&reserved=0>  
2.	Enter your OpenText email address and your initial password provided above. 
3.	Select a new password that meets our security standards (at least 10 characters, contains 1 uppercase alpha character, 1 lowercase alpha character, 1 numeric character and 1 non-alphanumeric character).
4.	Reconfirm your new password and click Submit.

 

If you would like a walkthrough, watch this video <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopentext.hubs.vidyard.com%2Fwatch%2FvZzz3xK2dfShrgmugDBnsQ%3F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848059024%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=dg1n717nFEPjRXwi4aQKDGkTcwKiTF8DWjg37ZswKhE%3D&reserved=0> . Your new password will be synced to various OpenText systems. You will receive an email notification in 90 days when it’s time to update your password again.

 

 

 

Step 3: Download and register Symantec VIP Access

 

 

 

Symantec VIP Access provides two-factor authentication for secure access to OpenText systems. Please follow the instructions below to download and register Symantec VIP Access on your preferred device(s).

 

Important: 

The instructions below are for Windows users. If you’re a Mac user, please refer to the Mac Guide <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcore.opentext.com%2Fpdfjs%2Fweb%2Fviewer.html%3FshortLink%3Dc84f374d1cf81894288c19343240c6b24c917cd34c3babe1&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=09tx7gZJCRBqcp74%2BELDGgD%2B0O%2FQ8XndkRjzyPorXn0%3D&reserved=0> . If you would like to add Symantec VIP Access to your mobile device (optional), please refer to the Mobile Guide <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcore.opentext.com%2Fpdfjs%2Fweb%2Fviewer.html%3FshortLink%3D278d17751c352c12df356d4795707809f01e0b73bf96abc0&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=7OGSsMayaV%2FiIkcWglIOGeegLwU3OhtqHAqDzqDrxuM%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Open Symantec VIP Access

Open the Windows Start menu and click on the VIP Access application.  

 

If you do not see the VIP Access application in your Start menu, you will need to follow the instructions to install it. If you already have VIP Access installed, skip to the Login instructions. 

 


Download Symantec VIP Access on your PC: 
(Video Instructions <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopentext.hubs.vidyard.com%2Fwatch%2F6HYidPK4cu9s3dRhqDYgTW%3F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=mep2tzzc%2BdR43%2FgvRxjh%2BRpUF2FSePd%2BFVlyFK49dw4%3D&reserved=0> )

 

Download and install the application from this link: https://vip.symantec.com <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvip.symantec.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=rQ4oDFTOhG5PwE%2FarQ6NP%2FonQ7ooUYywyuU7u4AdKLo%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Once the activation process is complete, the program will launch and display your unique Credential ID. You will need to register your Credential ID in the Symantec VIP Self Service portal explained in the next step. 

 

 

Log in to the Symantec VIP Self Service portal and register your device

(Video Instructions <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopentext.hubs.vidyard.com%2Fwatch%2FcCb9XRmT85AZjq3iCGXjpJ%3F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Bnj4NoZlO8aSA0EOFuppvYj3z9wOU9XtEfgoQEscG8k%3D&reserved=0> )



Connect to your Micro Focus Pulse Secure VPN to complete the following steps:

 

1.     Go to: https://symss.opentext.com <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsymss.opentext.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=6JoYozCffxIBt7zzPx6d0K96pv9J1o1peeYN7MiBWq4%3D&reserved=0>  and sign in with your OpenText username and password. (username NOT email address)

2.     Once you’ve successfully logged on, click Register.

3.     Enter a display name for your VIP Access token in the Credential Name field. We recommend that you use your OpenText username followed by the device type that you installed VIP Access on (for example: “janedoe-PC”).

4.     Launch VIP Access from the Windows Start menu.

5.     Enter the Credential ID from VIP Access in the Credential ID field.

6.     Enter the Security Code from VIP Access in the Security Code field (Note: VIP Access generates a new security code every 30 seconds).

7.     Click Submit.

 

Congratulations! You have completed your VIP Access setup. Going forward, when you are prompted to provide a security code, launch Symantec VIP Access to obtain the one-time security code to authenticate your access. 

 

Important: 

The Symantec VIP Self-Service portal will only be available until February 17, 2023.
After February 17, you will need to contact the OpenText IT Service Desk for assistance to complete your Symantec VIP registration.

 

 

 

Step 4: Download the Remote Desktop application 

 

 

 

The Remote Desktop application is a tool that allows you to remotely access your OpenText desktop interface (W365 Cloud PC), right from your current computer. Once logged in, you will have access to all OpenText tools and systems. 

 

The instructions below are for Windows users — if you’re a Mac user, please refer to the Mac Guide <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcore.opentext.com%2Fpdfjs%2Fweb%2Fviewer.html%3FshortLink%3D7d076917a8f532804bb1e76101a1c93bcc26e75276f2edef&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=G7JihihC4TxjDWkK4Hl%2FexNmIWVJJBLdcQwr8prpjws%3D&reserved=0>  for instructions.

 

Accessing your W365 Cloud PC can be done in two ways:

 

 


Option #1: Desktop Client (Recommended)


If you use a corporate-managed device, open the Windows Start menu and click on the  Remote Desktop application. Skip to Step 5 below. 

If you use a non-managed (BYOD), or the application is not in your Start menu, install the Remote Desktop application
from the following links:

Windows 10 or above:

Windows 64-bit <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgo.microsoft.com%2Ffwlink%2F%3Flinkid%3D2068602&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Zu0ktEuNuVQI9OgnPQVO2boGMhbPBVp4K2CmabC2ZkQ%3D&reserved=0> 

macOS

Mac App Store <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fapp%2Fmicrosoft-remote-desktop%2Fid1295203466%3Fmt%3D12&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=TVzyjGY5pa9avhvs5L4Go6m%2BhCcPd7Sid%2F4XGWFr6X4%3D&reserved=0> 

iOS and iPadOS 

App Store <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fapp%2Fmicrosoft-remote-desktop%2Fid714464092&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wavzJskGt15%2FL5i2j8s42cYDCykE9B6v64CBYsWLIjE%3D&reserved=0> 

Android/Chrome OS

Google Play Store <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.microsoft.rdc.androidx&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=TD1js090qFX3yZjjNqUZNssmDTyN%2Buf0lC7B2wxgdls%3D&reserved=0> 

Refer to the Windows Client Guide <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcore.opentext.com%2Fpdfjs%2Fweb%2Fviewer.html%3FshortLink%3D729f069d5f06fc1a36043e10f7950bafb8186e51e94eb09c&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=mWD4S5uUD9Gh1xs83h8Wr9FQR3Hih16lTYTaW5n%2F%2BrU%3D&reserved=0>  or video <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopentext.hubs.vidyard.com%2Fwatch%2F11spfzc47grkWDcsYPWvAm%3F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=g3iQvaaWWuayIo2IYEwfRzDjR7yqp7s4V1LlOnXRV%2BA%3D&reserved=0> .  



 

Option #2: Web Portal (Windows/Mac/Linux)

 

The Web Portal is a great option if you’re using Linux or on the go and need to access your W365 from a web browser.

 

Click here <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwindows365.microsoft.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=dPZn0EvBOiX%2Bt1Q0Zmi9nS5dCWTnP7ikoGfrq%2Fvuq0Q%3D&reserved=0>  to access the Web Portal.

(you may need to disable pop ups). 

 

Refer to the Web Portal Guide <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcore.opentext.com%2Fpdfjs%2Fweb%2Fviewer.html%3FshortLink%3Dd4731b53dd8a3bf6a157a98f894ff3c649f23ae3b0cb18f5&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=0Vdnjkszw5YU0s4LcwKFbQeTxqegPhu%2BQN8zuj5o3lU%3D&reserved=0>  or video <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopentext.hubs.vidyard.com%2Fwatch%2F11spfzc47grkWDcsYPWvAm%3F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=g3iQvaaWWuayIo2IYEwfRzDjR7yqp7s4V1LlOnXRV%2BA%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Note: The Web Portal version of W365 is not as effective for audio/video calling.

 

 

Step 5: Set up and log in to Windows 365 (W365) Cloud PC 

 

 

 

1.	Open the Remote Desktop application or the Web Portal
2.	Click Subscribe with URL
3.	Use the following Workspace URL:
	https://rdweb.wvd.microsoft.com/api/arm/feeddiscovery <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Frdweb.wvd.microsoft.com%2Fapi%2Farm%2Ffeeddiscovery&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=PZhphr%2BFXrX%2Fo6Pt59h2FEstyiTQaqHuyjX5ILTIpJs%3D&reserved=0>  and click Next
4.	Enter your OpenText Email address and click Next
5.	Enter your OpenText Username and password and click Sign In
6.	Enter your Security Code from VIP Access in the Security Code field
7.	Click on Cloud PC 

Note: The initial startup may take up to 10 minutes. Please be patient!

You can now begin using your OpenText W365 Cloud PC. You will need to use your Cloud PC to access OpenText systems, applications, and sites.  

Important:

You will not have an OpenText Outlook mailbox initally.Please continue to use your Micro Focus email client for managing emails until further instructed. You will receive a communication when your OpenText Outlook mailbox is ready for you to use.

 

 

 

Join us on Yammer

 

 

 

Join our Micro Focus Yammer community <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.yammer.com%2Fmain%2Forg%2Fopentext.com%2Fgroups%2FeyJfdHlwZSI6Ikdyb3VwIiwiaWQiOiIxMjU4ODgyOTkwMDgifQ%2Fall&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848215248%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=rzfhlWiuYq6HzvycueM7BbNh3pwe7nMuk0lYlKdBGXA%3D&reserved=0>  from your OpenText W365 desktop where you can connect with your colleagues, engage with our OpenText subject matter experts, ask questions, and access useful integration resources while you get settled over the coming weeks.

 



 

 

 

Need more help? Contact us any time!

 

*     For Micro Focus- issues, contact the Micro Focus Corporate Service Desk

*     For OpenText- Day 1 onboarding or Cloud PC issues, log an IT ticket via the options below.

 

IT Service Desk


Corporate IT emergency hotlines (24/7 support):

*	AMERICAS: +1 519 888 7111 x82611 | +1 800 980 2611
*	EMEA:_____+49 89 4629 2611 | +800 4357 2611
*	APAC:_____+63 2 8859 5823

 

If you cannot phone, email ithelp-integration@opentext.com <mailto:ithelp-integration@opentext.com>  with your name, description of issue and preferred method of contact (MS Teams, email, phone number).

Security

 

Inquiries or OpenText Partner security incidents:

*	IPCInfoSec@opentext.com <mailto:IPCInfoSec@opentext.com>  

 

Report an urgent security incident (24/7 support):

*	Security Operations Center: 

	*	+1 440 799 6033
	*	SED@opentext.com <mailto:SED@opentext.com>  
		
		

Resources


Corporate IT site (only accessible through OpenText W365 Cloud PC): https://corporateit.opentext.com <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcorporateit.opentext.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C630b99d6ea8b4a74440408db03963260%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107715848371950%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=jMBku9mf3M2yFY%2BIs3yE6F8qHDMNSJMPZFqJ96ytQJs%3D&reserved=0>  



 

If you reach the OpenText IT voicemail, please leave a message and the team will get back to you as soon as possible.

emails.subject: Welcome Micro Focus! Watch the CEO Town Hall recording
emails.body:
Internal Use – OpenText Confidential

 

“Digital life is life, and with Micro Focus' great products and talent, we will help organizations of all sizes accelerate their digital transformation." — Mark J. Barrenechea

 

Earlier today, OpenText CEO & CTO Mark J. Barrenechea hosted a special town hall to welcome our new Micro Focus team members to OpenText. 

 

At our Town Hall, Mark talked about who we are, how we win, and how we’re organized.    

 

Who we are: 

*	We are a growth company
*	We are innovators
*	We are disciplined operators
*	We are an impact company 

 

How we win: 

Mark discussed how we will focus on our key markets, build a stronger roadmap, and help customers transition to the Cloud through the OpenText L.O.V.E. model.  We obsess over our customers and our orientation around the cloud (private cloud, public cloud, API cloud, off-cloud) is differentiated.  

 

Most importantly, we innovate. The highlight of the Town Hall was a live demo of how OpenText Magellan and Micro Focus Vertica work together to show flight patterns over the UK.  Be sure to watch!       

 

How we are organized:  

We have key functional alignments to drive expertise and cohesion. We have defined business units with key engineering and sales leaders who will help to drive the growth of each. We have a clear north star vision on our strategy and an organizational structure that will support that.     

 

Watch the recording here: https://opentext.hubs.vidyard.com/watch/1MGMcZeB3BoHARoNRiTML1 <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopentext.hubs.vidyard.com%2Fwatch%2F1MGMcZeB3BoHARoNRiTML1&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C44cd0ae3d6df41a1797008db03b6f24a%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107856542879505%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=EEm4oZ%2FMOs0gOOtpa6Hzzixw5UhZyckFA%2FWS5qKg2j0%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Note: Micro Focus employees must be logged into OpenText Cloud PC to view.

 

Have questions? We have answers! 



Visit our Micro Focus Welcome page on OpenText Central <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fwelcome-micro-focus%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C44cd0ae3d6df41a1797008db03b6f24a%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107856542879505%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=hcWvQHEuZfrllRutPRKXwSTzrXzyUNxz9%2FFI5%2FFiubY%3D&reserved=0>  and InFocus <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmicrofocusinternational.sharepoint.com%2F_forms%2Fdefault.aspx&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7C44cd0ae3d6df41a1797008db03b6f24a%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107856542879505%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2BAS7388bioFKRPYvz8ikAh1xCwgyHto1PiTpkw%2BtkNc%3D&reserved=0>  for onboarding resources, FAQs, IT contact information, resources for managers, and more. If you have additional questions beyond these resources, please email ask@opentext.com <mailto:ask@opentext.com>  and one of our team members will get back to you. 

 

Welcome to OpenText!

emails.subject: Welcome to OpenText: Ways to Stay Connected Plus Download your Digital Welcome Kit!
emails.body:
Internal Use – Confidential – To: All Micro Focus Employees

 

Welcome to OpenText! We’re so glad you’re here.

 

Over the next few weeks, you’ll begin to experience the unique culture that makes OpenText, OpenText! You’ll have a chance to meet new colleagues, learn more about the business, and settle into your new roles as OpenTexters. 

 

In this email you will find several tools and resources to help you navigate the next few days. If you have any questions, be sure to check the Employee FAQ <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fwelcome-micro-focus%2Fmicro-focus-frequently-asked-questions%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2FTek7IkxQMe7Nd3XNVVaw8d3wMWv4oWHZfjX02vTpQI%3D&reserved=0>  on OpenText Central or email ask@opentext.com <mailto:ask@opentext.com> . 

Please note: You must be logged in to your OpenText Cloud PC to access resources.

OpenText Central: Your one-stop-shop for all things OpenText

 

OpenText Central (OTC) is our company intranet, a place where you can easily find important resources and information, learn about the latest company updates, and discover what’s new at OpenText. We highly encourage all employees to check OTC on a regular basis. 

 

Start exploring OTC today to learn about OpenText as a company, explore tools and services available to employees, pop by the CEO corner, and more: central.opentext.com <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N5n50%2F5DPy8stjc9XgWVwjj5bdFIMrMHiPce1QHFotE%3D&reserved=0> . 

 

OTC Micro Focus Welcome Page

Visit the dedicated Micro Focus Welcome page on OTC <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fwelcome-micro-focus%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=GZMEoYOHdsvCRcSheIEsS3vwJmRxO5ZSMJeW%2F4VAVx4%3D&reserved=0>  as a first resource when looking for information. We will regularly update the page so that you have up-to-date information regarding any action you need to take, chances to win prizes, and important updates. 

 

Here is a list of what you can find beginning today:

 

*	CEO Corner: the latest news and insights from CEO Mark J. Barrenechea
*	Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs): Have questions? We have answers. Browse the full list of FAQs.
*	Customer-Facing Resources including our Corporate deck, customer letter, OpenText overview infographic, and everything you need to confidentially connect with customers
*	Learning & Policies: links to important corporate onboarding courses and key policies
*	Key Dates: Stay on track and don’t miss a beat with this quick view of important actions to take month by month
*	Product Overviews: Learn how to position our products and solutions
*	CEO and ELT Town Hall Links & Recordings
*	A roundup of all the resources in this email

 

The welcome page will also be replicated on InFocus so that you can simply access all materials wherever you are.

 

Download your OpenText Digital Welcome Kit

 

We’ve prepared a special Welcome Kit <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Ftools-services%2Fmarketing-services%2Fbrand-central%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=GjZ8T9U04DrnRb%2FND6PzBcABZSl3YMWjGzw6orUZV5c%3D&reserved=0>  that we hope you’ll take the time to explore and enjoy! Your Welcome Kit includes: 

 

*	A special video message from OpenText CEO, Mark J. Barrenechea welcoming you to OpenText.
*	Tools to help you get social including dynamic assets that you can share with your social media networks about your new role at OpenText! 
*	Access to Email signatures, Teams backgrounds, PowerPoint Templates, and any other creative assets you may need to become a tried-and-true OpenTexter! 
*	Our OpenText Employer Value Proposition and Overview Infographic with helpful quick company facts that all OpenTexters should know. 
*	And more!

 

Download your OpenText Welcome Kit today! Find it on OTC and InFocus.

 

Did we mention you can WIN OpenText swag? Head over to Yammer <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.yammer.com%2Fmain%2Forg%2Fopentext.com%2Fgroups%2FeyJfdHlwZSI6Ikdyb3VwIiwiaWQiOiIxMjU4ODgyOTkwMDgifQ%2Fnew&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=O%2B1Te2KU63CgSW%2BzmkeH3z06AEEOV73qR6It4Bxt580%3D&reserved=0> , and give our Welcome Kit post a “thumbs up” for a chance to win one of three pairs of OpenText-branded Apple AirPods or one of seven OpenText swag bags.

 

Stay in-the-know and connect with colleagues!

We have several ways for you to keep up to date on important OpenText news and events as well as engage with your colleagues from around the world: 

 

*	Follow OpenText on LinkedIn <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fcompany%2Fopentext%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=VCe0wfAiMvq4UCv0rqmwZ%2Fc6hCswQ8YZL%2FwAv5nLSwM%3D&reserved=0>  and Twitter <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FOpenText&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=n2EBFrdqTXlIa97HqCNVHxlnwp%2Bim61d3XwoRUytSPk%3D&reserved=0>  to access relevant news and content that you can easily share with your own social networks.
*	Join the Welcome Micro Focus <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.yammer.com%2Fmain%2Forg%2Fopentext.com%2Fgroups%2FeyJfdHlwZSI6Ikdyb3VwIiwiaWQiOiIxMjU4ODgyOTkwMDgifQ%2Fnew&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=O%2B1Te2KU63CgSW%2BzmkeH3z06AEEOV73qR6It4Bxt580%3D&reserved=0>  and OpenText Employee Connect <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.yammer.com%2Fmain%2Forg%2Fopentext.com%2Fgroups%2FeyJfdHlwZSI6Ikdyb3VwIiwiaWQiOiIxMzUxNjA0MiJ9%2Fnew&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=foREK79yybTTjcd%2BKTTbHm0%2BswLksHPGLnUZcmPITag%3D&reserved=0>  Yammer groups to receive regular and relevant updates, get involved in discussions with colleagues, participate in contents, and more!
*	Keep an eye on your inbox at the end this week for a special company newsletter with highlights from the first week, and at the end of each month for the OpenText EConnect newsletter.
*	And don’t forget to regularly check OpenText Central <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=N5n50%2F5DPy8stjc9XgWVwjj5bdFIMrMHiPce1QHFotE%3D&reserved=0>  for timely company updates.

 

Questions? 

Be sure to refer to the Employee FAQ <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fwelcome-micro-focus%2Fmicro-focus-frequently-asked-questions%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cce1076a856e5414cb04b08db03bdd64c%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107886147110085%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2FTek7IkxQMe7Nd3XNVVaw8d3wMWv4oWHZfjX02vTpQI%3D&reserved=0>  document or reach out to ask@opentext.com <mailto:ask@opentext.com> .  


The OpenText Corporate Communications Team

emails.subject: OpenText Fast Start Sales Commission Plan
emails.body:
OpenText Fast Start Sales Commission Plan

 

To:  New Business/License and Services Sales teams

Cc:  Sales Compensation Operations

 

 

Dear Sales team members,

 

Today marks a new beginning, full of potential and exciting opportunities, as we start our journey as OpenText.

 

During the integration and realignment to OpenText’s fiscal year (July – June), it’s important that we continue to execute our GTM strategy. To maintain focus and to help us succeed, your current sales plans, assigned quota, accounts, territory and terms will remain unchanged until the end of OpenText’s 2023 fiscal year, ending on June 30, 2023. To align with OpenText’s FY24, you will be issued new sales plans in July, effective July 1, 2023.

 

To facilitate a strong fiscal year-end in June and to mitigate the impact of your sales plan ending early, the point at which accelerators apply will be lowered from 100% to 66.6% of performance, unless otherwise communicated. As renewal quotas align to contract dates and are not linear in nature, where sales plans have renewal metrics, the renewal metric will contribute as if it were at 100% year-to-date attainment each pay cycle, i.e. straight line to 66.6% by June. Otherwise, you will continue to be paid on your existing sales plan at your current quota and payment cadence between now and June and you won’t be issued a new sales letter.

 

The additional accelerated performance will be calculated in August, once the June 2023 commission calculations have been finalized, for payment in September.

 

Note: You must be an active employee in good standing and have an accepted OpenText FY24 plan in order to be eligible for this top up payment.

 

You are encouraged to pull as much business into the next five months as possible to maximize your accelerators. Please review the attached FAQs to see an example of how this will be calculated and for contacts if you have additional questions.

 

Kind Regards,

Emma and Dusty

 

Emma Burgaz

Dustine Barnes

Senior Director

Senior Manager

Sales Effectiveness and Sales Compensation

Global Sales Compensation Operations

 

____________________________________________________________________

As set forth in the FY22 Global Sales Compensation Policy, which is accessible on the Sales Compensation Resource Central, OpenText reserves the right to change or discontinue Sales Compensation Plans with or without notice, at any time to the full extent permissible under applicable law. This includes,  but is not limited to, adjusting accounts, goals/quota, territory, Target Incentive Amount or Sales credits, whether to address changing or unforeseen business conditions, to correct administrative errors, to adjust for incompletion of measurement plan periods, to provide coverage when other sales employees change positions or terminate, to adjust for base pay changes, to implement decisions from Incentive and Conditions Reviews, to adjust for mergers, acquisitions, or other structural changes within OpenText or a customer, or for other reasons at OpenText’s discretion and in accordance with applicable local law. This includes changes that may have retroactive and/or prospective effect, which changes may act to ultimately increase or decrease incentive compensation. In addition, Sales Letters may be reissued in the event changes are made to a Sales Compensation Plan, Sales Objectives Plan, Target Incentive Amount (TIA), Quota or sales objective measures.   

For those countries that require consultation with works councils or other employee representatives, this is not intended to provide country-specific information and in no way reflects that final decisions have been made at a country level. With respect to such countries, final decisions are subject to prior consultation with works councils and other employee representatives, and compliance with local laws.

 

The Company’s proposal is subject to any required consultation obligations with Works Councils or other employee representatives, in compliance with local laws in applicable countries.

 

Any communication developed and distributed to eligible employees and/or Sales management using any communication vehicle by Sales Compensation or business groups must have explicit approval from Sales Compensation Communications.

 

 

 

 

Confidential—Internal Use Only | © 2023 OpenText.

 

 

 

				
	 

		

 

 


________________________________

You may unsubscribe from this list if you are not part of an automated membership. To unsubscribe from the DL-MF-CSV6 list, click the following link:
http://ilist.microfocus.com/scripts/wa.exe?TICKET=NzM4NTgxIHdpbGxpYW0ubWFyY3FATUlDUk9GT0NVUy5DT00gREwtTUYtQ1NWNtz7f7JgkLhp&c=SIGNOFF <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Filist.microfocus.com%2Fscripts%2Fwa.exe%3FTICKET%3DNzM4NTgxIHdpbGxpYW0ubWFyY3FATUlDUk9GT0NVUy5DT00gREwtTUYtQ1NWNtz7f7JgkLhp%26c%3DSIGNOFF&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Ca79f21a01d43499b8f7f08db03d18e1e%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638107970899886124%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=o16Yns%2FlVLIHezP9AfYpeLPFH4gN7O4jDZ2fhPDqTkQ%3D&reserved=0> 

Note that your unsubscribe request will be processed only if you have explicitly subscribed to this list.

emails.subject: Return to office - Tour Carpe Diem (La Defense) office
emails.body:
<https://cm-email-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ContactMonkey-Team-exnwCismR1wmF1Xo4P75FSs40MRhjseLQxBTjxEWesSzA4WMCRVzoZgI7JuisOMFOK3qTaXipuvphz1VOxSaO5VCUemFpecj2DjAfKw5VOfeCNOoYf8REqCVs4snEHAm/OpenText-Logo-INV-2017-no%20safe%20space.png> 

Return to office


To: All colleagues based in Tour Carpe Diem (La Defense) office  

 

Dear Colleagues,

 

Last week, you received a communication from Brian Sweeney, EVP, Chief Human Resources Officer, outlining the next phase of our Return to Office program, #BetterTogether. Fundamentally, we need to come together in our offices for collaboration and innovation, while maintaining the flexibility of some home working days.

 

In our Tour Carpe Diem Micro Focus office, we have enough seating available and your works council has been recently consulted on the RTO, so please make sure you plan for the transition back into the office and review our Coming to the Office checklist <https://comms.microfocus.com/api/v1/tracker?cm_session=7ac7f718-237d-47bb-a478-70728fc96fbe&cs=08288e67-490c-4588-ba02-9d985c90f355&cm_type=link&cm_link=a7efb5b4-2607-4ca9-8e15-405dbe1539e2&cm_destination=https://microfocusinternational.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/InFocus/OpenText/Coming%20to%20the%20Office%20-%20Checklist.pdf?csf=1&web=1&e=aNBeCA> . You can also learn more by visiting our Return to the Office page <https://comms.microfocus.com/api/v1/tracker?cm_session=7ac7f718-237d-47bb-a478-70728fc96fbe&cs=08288e67-490c-4588-ba02-9d985c90f355&cm_type=link&cm_link=b8cebd6b-dfd0-48be-b9d9-eca115094ff7&cm_destination=https://central.opentext.com/return-to-the-office/>  (please log into your OpenText Cloud PC to access this resource) where we have compiled a list of FAQs <https://comms.microfocus.com/api/v1/tracker?cm_session=7ac7f718-237d-47bb-a478-70728fc96fbe&cs=08288e67-490c-4588-ba02-9d985c90f355&cm_type=link&cm_link=c9f5ed58-fb21-48fd-a801-1461280681c9&cm_destination=https://microfocusinternational.sharepoint.com/sites/InFocus/OpenText/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FInFocus%2FOpenText%2FRTO%20FAQ%20Following%20Leader%20Connect%20Session%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2FInFocus%2FOpenText&p=true&ga=1>  to address the most common questions. 

 

Reminder

The BetterTogether program is a two phased approach designed to complement our existing ways of working program:

 

Phase 1: March to June, office-based employees are returning globally 2 days a week (any choice of days), and employees are welcome to be back more days if they prefer.

 

Phase 2: July 2023 onward, office-based employees will be in the office together 3 days a week, aligned with the corporate days (Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday), with the flexibility to work remotely on Mondays and Fridays.

 

If you have any questions in the meantime, please contact 

David Michael <mailto:david.michael@microfocus.com> , GRE.

 

 

Global Real Estate

Confidential—Internal Use Only | © 2023 OpenText

emails.subject: Get Ready for Return to the Office: We are Better Together
emails.body:
Internal Use – Confidential – To: Our New Colleagues

 

Colleagues,

 

The 01 March,2023, marks an important milestone in your journey as OpenText employees as we start the next phase of our Return to Office program, #BetterTogether. All our offices are open and ready to welcome you back.

 

You will have heard Mark Barrenechea, our CEO and CTO, talk recently on our all-employee town hall <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopentext.hubs.vidyard.com%2Fwatch%2F7Mse2a9bS9wmhuZvRaZXzy%3Flogin_complete%3Dtrue&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cbddff1d3103b48c5649008db168d7127%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638128568981265746%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=TrQeh7KunI4axL4bmBvZOJ1xBr2AY0jZHKgJll%2BDfOg%3D&reserved=0>  about the importance of #BetterTogether and how our Return to Office plan ultimately delivers 40% flexible time for employees in a working week - mixing time being together in the office, as well as working some days at home. 

 

Going forward, we need to use our offices to their full potential, while also appreciating the benefits of a hybrid workforce. Our offices will be used for moments that matter, and collaboration that drives innovation and creativity. These things are all essential elements of your colleague experience at OpenText. 

 

Our Return to Office program is a two phased approach that complements your existing ways of working program:

 

Phase 1: March to June, office-based employees are returning globally 2 days a week (any choice of days), and of course, employees are welcome to be back more days if they prefer.

 

Phase 2: July 2023 onward, office-based employees will be in the office together 3 days a week, aligned with the corporate days (Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday) with the flexibility to work remotely the Mondays and Fridays.

 

We appreciate that returning to the office will be a transition for some employees, whilst others have already embraced this. Your managers have been briefed and are ready to provide you with advice and guidance to support you on your return to office plans.

 

If it has been a while since you’ve been in the office, please make sure you review our ‘Coming to the Office’ checklist <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fwelcome-micro-focus%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cbddff1d3103b48c5649008db168d7127%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638128568981421976%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=GuuH2hC2zYbMZAUOqXAmvHbb7BPgEpMXvtrupnMMzfE%3D&reserved=0> .  You can also learn more by visiting our Return to the Office page <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Freturn-to-the-office%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cbddff1d3103b48c5649008db168d7127%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638128568981421976%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=O8ePr7dV9WUPTqbNu%2Bi8%2FwN5GG%2BA%2BXyQVDyO38CGFck%3D&reserved=0>  where we have compiled a list of FAQs <https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcentral.opentext.com%2Fwelcome-micro-focus%2Fmicro-focus-frequently-asked-questions%2F&data=05%7C01%7Cwilliam.marcq%40microfocus.com%7Cbddff1d3103b48c5649008db168d7127%7C856b813c16e549a585ec6f081e13b527%7C0%7C0%7C638128568981421976%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=WJd5bDEjYnBgbIxdq4zVsfql7Ssn2aa002digL8w%2BH0%3D&reserved=0>  to address the most common questions. You may also receive communications directly from your site with additional instructions to assist your return.

 

We look forward to seeing you all around the office again soon. We are #BetterTogether. 

 

The Company’s proposal is subject to any required consultation obligations with Works Councils or other employee representatives, in compliance with local laws in applicable countries.

 

Brian Sweeney
EVP, Chief Human Resources Officer

emails.subject: URGENT & IMPORTANT | Update & Add SFDC Activities
emails.body:
Team,

 

We’re carrying the red lantern as the two countries with the least visibility of our Sales Engineering activities as they relate to opportunities. We need to change this urgently. You all do a great job in your day-to-day activities. But we also need to show that.

 

By Tuesday EOB I need to ask you to

1.	update all your existing SFDC “Pre-Sales Activities” with all mandatory fields
2.	enter all “Pre-Sales Activities” for all your opportunity-related activities since beginning of this FY and attach them to an opportunity; do not forget to add all mandatory fields

 

As a bonus: You can report the time for this activity against an opportunity

 

Mandatory fields:

*	Reason (select from drop-down table)
*	Status (select from drop-down table)
*	Subject (format: <reason>: <action> <customer>, e.g. “Demo: OpsB+APM STELLANTIS”)
*	Est. Hours (total of hours worked on activity; for past activities: please estimate)
*	Priority (go with the preselected value)
*	Target Completion Date (this is only visible after you saved the task and edit it again!!) (use the project end date or an earlier individual date).

 

Attached:

*	SFDC Activity Tracking process description.
*	All SFDCs OPPs, tabbed by country (DECH, FRANCE) and LOST, WON, OPEN. You can filter by column “F” (product center) to see only the OPPs for your product group.

 

If in doubt, whether an activity is opportunity related (like preparing a demo environment), the answer always is: Yes, it is related to an OPP.

 

Please don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions.

 

Regards,

Robert

 

Robert Kreher  |  Sales Engineering Manager

IT Operations Management | France, Germany & Switzerland

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mobile:  +49 162 292 8992 | Mail:  kreher@microfocus.com <mailto:kreher@microfocus.com>

emails.subject: POC process update: announcement
emails.body:
To: Digital Business Operations SEs

 

Dear all,

 

I am pleased to announce a new World Wide Proof of Concept process (formerly known as POC Trip Report process) for the Digital Operations Management Sales Engineers.

 

All Proof of Concepts engagements you will deliver going forward are expected to follow this new simplified process so please familiarize with it, especially with the communication part and be ready to adopt it if you are going to start a new Proof of Concept engagement.

 

The new process leverages our learnings to date and it is streamlined, focused on:

*	Clear communication with reduced effort
*	Responsive support
*	Knowledge reuse

Please take few minutes to review the process description <https://microfocusinternational-my.sharepoint.com/:b:/g/personal/alex_bruckner_microfocus_com/ETC0NOkRLCtNo1-iRzwWZTUBeT7AoVg57JZDnWIcouRbyw?e=BT3acq>  and the  PoC communication guidelines <https://microfocusinternational-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/alex_bruckner_microfocus_com/ETgDem-SlD9DlHdFXeCcpVYByZ3b1cOJ9wXNo4vj19Jn6A?e=OcqQcn> .

 

Outlook email templates are available <https://microfocusinternational-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/g/personal/alex_bruckner_microfocus_com/ElPAhXudWmZOtdbybhVfEmIBdkF7HR_Y60u4otLDBA4rGw?e=kPBXPP>  for you to leverage.

 

As we run the process and capture more knowledge, we will make available additional artifacts to help you with the preparation of a Proof of Concept delivery. 

 

In case you have any questions or feedback, please reach out to the Global Practice Managers. 

 

Many thanks to Alex and the Global Practice team for the effort spent to review and update the process and thank you all for your continuous support. 

 

Best regards,

 

Andrea 

Global Practice & Technology Office 

 

 

  

Confidential—Internal Use Only | © 2023 Micro Focus.

emails.subject: ITOM Cloud Product Portfolio Differences from Off-Cloud
emails.body:
Dear all, 

 

We have received many requests from you on the difference between Cloud and off-cloud versions. So, I want to ensure you know the latest addition to our product's sales material.

 

The product team shared this simple table with links that will direct you and download the recent presentation and documents outlining the functional, operational, and license differences between the SaaS and non-cloud versions of the product. The material is already available on our sales portal; however, the table below gives you the direct link under each product.

emails.subject: Happy powerpointing and opentexting ;)
emails.body:
Dear fellow slide-smashers!

 

As I’ve just learned we need to discontinue the use of the MF “green shapes” ITOM PPT template by July 1st …

And as you need to be in OT’s Cloud PC to get to OT Brand Central …

 

*	For your convenience, find attached the latest PPTs from there:

	*	Light theme template
	*	Dark theme template
	*	Icons collection

 

The “basic” and “colourful” icons collections we got in January apparently go into the bin along with the “green shapes” template. 

So these here are the icons to use, it seems.

 

No, I’m not particularly keen either on redrawing my slideware again, after I’ve just started applying the “green” MF ITOM template over the winter …

This one’s inevitable though, I guess – and I assume more sustainable than the last. 😉

I’ll take them one by one, convert when needed … 

 

So - happy powerpointing and opentexting ;)

 

BR

 

KLAUS

 

 

Mit freundlichen Grüßen / with kind regards

 

Klaus Holthaus
Sales Engineer IT Operations Management

Planned absence: 6.-23.4.2023

 

 <https://www.microfocus.com/en-us/home> 

(M) +49 170 5378423

klaus.holthaus@microfocus.com <mailto:klaus.holthaus@microfocus.com>  

Micro Focus Deutschland GmbH 
Herrenberger Straße 140

71034 Böblingen

Germany

 

Geschäftsführer: Christian Waida, Madhu Ranganathan, Michael Fernando Acedo

Sitz der Gesellschaft: Böblingen, Amtsgericht Stuttgart HRB 758692

emails.subject: Sales Objective Plan FY2023
emails.body:
Bonjour,

 

On a trouvé une solution pour vos SOPs FY23. L’accord trouvé :

1.	Vous serez payés à 100% TIA pour le premier trimestre.
2.	Comme en Allemagne, l’évaluation de l’objectif par le manager ne sera pas appliquée pour les trimestres suivants de FY23. Donc vous serez payée strictement sur la réalisation du team quota.
3.	Le paiement par trimestre n’est pas changé.

 

J’attends désormais qu’une nouvelle version du SOP soit fournie à vous qui reflète ces derniers changements.

 

Cordialement,

Robert

 

Robert Kreher  |  Sales Engineering Manager

IT Operations Management | France, Germany & Switzerland

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mobile:  +49 162 292 8992 | Mail:  kreher@microfocus.com <mailto:kreher@microfocus.com>

emails.subject: SMAX Self Service Portal migration
emails.body:
Hi Team,

 

Over the weekend the DCoE SaaS SMAX instance was migrated to a new home and the new URL to access the demo content is https://eu3-smax.saas.microfocus.com/saw/ess?TENANTID=319579752. 

 

Not all Knowledge Articles migrated as hoped which means some of the narrative images may be missing. Please bear with us whilst we resolve these missing items.

 

Please let us know if you find something that isn’t working properly in the new portal, and we’ll resolve it as quickly as possible.

 

Warm regards,

 

OpenText DCoE team
